children.text: There is a visible defect in the roof tile pointing that looks poorly finished.
The Victorian Building Authority’s, Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 6.04 Roof tile pointing states that

‘The pointing is defective if it is not uniform in colour, texture and trowelled off to provide a neat appearance. The rectification of pointing shall match the existing colour and texture as close as practicable’ .
This section of roof pointing should be rectified in accordance with above.
